translations: 对……行凶抢劫；扮鬼脸，扮怪相（mug 的过去式与过去分词）

sentences.sentence: You can think yourself lucky you didn't get mugged.
sentences.translation: 你未遭暴力抢劫，可以算是万幸了。

sentences.sentence: She had been mugged in the street in broad daylight.
sentences.translation: 光天化日之下，她在街上遭到抢劫。

sentences.sentence: You may ask your self, ‘Why was I mugged?’
sentences.translation: 你或许会问“为什么是我被抢劫了？”
